content.description: to the left of slabalicious. Start on a left side pull and a right hand crimp, with a foot on what looks like a shoehorn sticking out of the wall and move directly up. The crux is getting to the high right hand crimp before movin left to the hug and sloper. The top out is very hard to protect so please be careful.
content.protection: You probably need a few pads, and a couple of good spotters to guard the fall into the pit and the left barn door on the top out
content.location: It is a tall slab standing alone towards the end of the mad max boulders. The wall is shared only with slabalicious.

content.description: Start on the obvious pinch block on the bottom left side of The Godfather Boulder and head up and left.
content.location: See main area for how to get to Godfather Boulder

content.description: Start on incut crimps in the middle of the wall, a few feet right of the starting jugs for "Clean Money - V4." Move right through incut crimps and jugs to the right corner of the boulder. Turn it and drop.
content.location: The rightmost route on the godfather boulder.

content.description: Also starts on the obvious pinch block and heads up and right towards the center of the boulder.  Highbally topout but fun moves at the base.
content.location: See main area for description of The Godfather Boulder.

content.description: Bouldering spread out around the trail that passes past the Mad Max wall area.  Lots of boulders, with the obvious Godfather Boulder along the trail.
